courses.title: Modern Web Programming
courses.description: Covers client-side and server-side programming, Model-View-Controller architecture, AJAX, RESTful web services, and databases.

courses.title: Computer Organization
courses.description: Learn to program in Assembly while covering the fundamentals of computer hardware design, transistors, and logic gates.

courses.title: System Fundamentals
courses.description: Connects high level programming languages to primitive computer processes.

courses.title: Foundations of Programming
courses.description: Covers common design patterns found in object oriented programming such as Model-View-Controller, threads, GUIs

courses.title: Data Structures
courses.description: Understand different ways to represent data, their pros and cons, as well as a few sorting and traversal algorithms.

courses.title: Intro to Programming
courses.description: Learn python basics as well as looping, recursion, creation of variables, and built my first programs

courses.title: Intro to Data Science
courses.description: Use python to process and visualize data
